abstract: Luke Donald shares first-round lead at RBC Heritage tournament in Hilton Head Island, SC.

headline.print_headline: Donald Shares Lead in South Carolina
headline.main: Luke Donald Shares Lead in South Carolina

snippet: Donald came back strong in the RBC Heritage in Hilton Head Island, S.C., after missing the Masters for the first time since 2004.
lead_paragraph: Donald came back strong in the RBC Heritage in Hilton Head Island, S.C., after missing the Masters for the first time since 2004.
